title: Set custom site domain to beyhubx.com

requirements.text: Configure the deployed site to use the custom domain "beyhubx.com" as the primary website URL.
acceptanceCriteria: The app is reachable at https://beyhubx.com/ in a browser.
If the app is also reachable via any previous default/temporary domain, visiting that domain redirects to https://beyhubx.com/ (preserving the path and hash fragment when present).

requirements.text: Update the frontend HTML head metadata to reflect the canonical site URL "https://beyhubx.com" (e.g., canonical link and/or Open Graph URL) so shared links and previews resolve to the new domain.
acceptanceCriteria: The built frontend includes canonical/URL metadata referencing https://beyhubx.com (no references to an old domain in head metadata).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not rename the product/app name (it remains "Bey Hub X").
Do not change backend APIs or data models solely for the domain change.
